definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
see 水中撈月|水中捞月[shui3 zhong1 lao1 yue4]
see 大海撈針|大海捞针[da4 hai3 lao1 zhen1]
Haidilao (aka Hai Di Lao), hot pot restaurant chain founded in Sichuan in 1994
coco de mer or "sea coconut" (Lodoicea maldivica)
mūlādhāra or muladhara, the root or Saturn chakra 查克拉, residing in the coccyx

sentences.english: In the morning sunshine, underwater world was beautiful vi-sion.
sentences.chinese: 在早晨阳光的照射下，海底世界美得如梦如幻。

sentences.english: Acoustic correlation velocity measurement technology is used to make measurements of velocity relative to the seabed.
sentences.chinese: 声相关测速技术可以测得舰船相对于海底的绝对速度。

sentences.english: The underwater world three sides by the sea side, everybody is like there.
sentences.chinese: 海底世界三面环山一面靠海，大家都十分的喜欢那里。

sentences.english: The third one was about building submarine cable tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 第三则是关于建造海底电缆隧道。

sentences.english: Why is Pinocchio under the sea?
sentences.chinese: 为什么皮诺丘会在海底下？

sentences.english: Do you have any doubts that he's dead and at the bottom of the sea?
sentences.chinese: 你对他的死亡和葬身海底的说法有所怀疑吗？

sentences.english: A sound made by tapping on the hull of a ship will be reflected from the sea bottom.
sentences.chinese: 通过敲击空船发出的声音将会从海底反射回来。

sentences.english: Shown in the figure is 100 feet long aquarium submarine channels.
sentences.chinese: 图中所示的是水族馆内长达100英尺的海底通道。

sentences.english: Within a moment or two, its body was dragged by the killers down into the depths of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 没过一会，它的身体就被虎鲸们拖回了海底深处。

sentences.english: The Weedy Sea Dragon is a weird, wonderful and colorful underwater creature.
sentences.chinese: 草海龙是一种诡异但却奇妙而色彩斑斓的海底生物。

sentences.english: In a massive explosion, card and tin unseeing tanker sank to the seabed.
sentences.chinese: 在巨大的爆炸声中，卡锡惨叫着和油轮沉入了海底。

sentences.english: The ship sank deep into the sea.
Now he was himself plumbing an unfathomable sea.
sentences.chinese: 现在他自已正在向那深不可测的海底进发。

sentences.english: Now we arrive at the Submarine Thatched Hut. Look!
sentences.chinese: 现在我们来到了海底草庐。

sentences.english: He is estimated to be 30 years old and feeds on shellfish.
sentences.chinese: 据了解，这条鱼已有30岁，以海底贝类生物为食。

sentences.english: They can not be used as substitute.

definition: shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
